name: Snail Tail
description:
My Submission for the Bitsy Snail Jam https://itch.io/jam/snails-bitsy

Traveling is a lot more fun when you can carry you're house on your back but also a lot slower.

Move forwards towards the mollusk family reunion or go back to retreat into your home

Is there, perhaps, romance on the trail? There's only one way to find out!
